price: 16. Dieną, kai Mes pričiupsime jus su didžiausiu smūgiu (bausme). Iš tiesų, Mes pareikalausime atpildo.
arabic: يَوۡمَ نَبۡطِشُ ٱلۡبَطۡشَةَ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰٓ إِنَّا مُنتَقِمُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yawma nabṭishu al-baṭshata al-kub'rā innā muntaqimūna
